body: Hi Daniel, I don't know the answer to modeling a Roof Pond. I think a good place to ask the question like this is (unmethours.com). The example file that you attached is from EnergyPlus example files and [is different](https://www.google.com/search?q=direct+evaporative+cooler+system&espv=2&biw=1280&bih=713&tbm=isch&tbo=u&source=univ&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjVyb23ic_JAhXKkx4KHTo9CCYQsAQIIQ) from what you're trying to achieve. Let us know if you find a solution in EnergyPlus and we should be able to implement it in Honeybee.
